LanguageData.GUC_StatPart_HandlingMultiplier: Multiplier for handling skill of rider
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingAccuracyImpact_Title: Accuracy impact per animal handling level (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingAccuracyImpact_Description: If the animal handling skill of a pawn is below the level that would be needed to tame the animal, this is a per level-penalty. Otherwise it is a per-level bonus.
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingMovementImpact_Title: Movement impact per animal handling level (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.GUC_HandlingMovementImpact_Description: If the animal handling skill of a pawn is below the level that would be needed to tame the animal, this is a per level-penalty. Otherwise it is a per-level bonus.
LanguageData.GUC_AccuracyPenalty_Title: Mounted accuracy penalty (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.GUC_AccuracyPenalty_Description: Accuracy penalty when pawns are mounted
LanguageData.GUC_BodySizeFilter_Title: Filter by body size (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.GUC_BodySizeFilter_Description: Filter mountable animals by body size
LanguageData.GUC_DrawBehavior_Description: Any checked animals will have their rendering behavior swapped (drawn in front of pawns).
LanguageData.GU_Enable_RnR_Description: Disabling this module will remove functionality related to pawns using mounts to get around the map out of convenience or for jobs. Changing this setting requires a restart.
LanguageData.GU_Enable_BattleMounts_Description: Disabling this module will remove functionality related to pawns (both colonists and enemies) using animals as battle mounts. Changing this setting requires a restart.
LanguageData.GU_Enable_Caravans_Description: Disabling this module will remove functionality related to pawns (both colonists and friendlies) riding animals when they exit and enter the map. Changing this setting requires a restart.
